Source: Daniel Rubino / Windows Central
While 2021 was a big year for new devices and services from Microsoft, the company also ended support for several of its products. Gamers, business customers,… [+6109 chars]

articles.author: Mahmoud Itani
articles.title: Want to ditch Google services? Apple’s ecosystem is almost the perfect replacement - XDA Developers
articles.description: Ditching Google services in Apple's ecosystem is doable. However, it can come with certain frustrations, depending on your routines.
articles.content: Apple markets its products and services as privacy-focused ones. When you buy a device from the company and use the included software, you’re assured that your data isn’t getting sold to third partie… [+13881 chars]
